Here we change the line of code in our script to have the string `"Hello Matt"` instead of `"Hello from Python!"`.

```{python}
#| output: false
#| filename: "script.py"
print("Hello Matt")
```

When we run our changed script we see that it now prints our new string to the screen:

```{.bash filename="Terminal/Command Prompt"}
python script.py
```

```{python}
#| echo: false
print("Hello Matt")
```
